thread.title: Manchester United goalkeeper injury scare forces club to recall Dean Henderson from loan deal at Grimsby
thread.title_full: Manchester United goalkeeper injury scare forces club to recall Dean Henderson from loan deal at Grimsby

author: dwright
title: Manchester United goalkeeper injury scare forces club to recall Dean Henderson from loan deal at Grimsby
text:
keeper mystery Manchester United goalkeeper injury scare forces club to recall Dean Henderson from loan deal at Grimsby 
Mystery as Grimsby reveal Henderson sent back to Old Trafford because of 'significany' injury to a United first team stopper By DUNCAN WRIGHT Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MANCHESTER UNITED have recalled young goalkeeper Dean Henderson from a loan spell at Grimsby because of a ‘significant injury’ to one of their first team stoppers. 
United want Henderson back at Old Trafford and Grimsby fanned speculation over who had been injured when they released a statement explaining why. Pro Sports Images Ltd. 
The statement said: “Dean has been recalled by his parent club due to a significant injury to one of their first team goalkeepers.” 
More follows
